explains: v. 支持，维护（法规、制度或原则）；认可，维持（法院原判）；鼓励；举起

sentences.en: We have a duty to uphold the law.
sentences.cn: 维护法律是我们的责任。

sentences.en: Our policy has been to uphold the law.
sentences.cn: 我们的政策一直是维护法律。

sentences.en: It is the responsibility of every government to uphold certain basic principles.
sentences.cn: 每个政府都有责任维护某些基本原则。
